name: Dumpling's Adventure
description:
How to Play:

Press Up and Down arrows with tempo to move your dumpling!

Press Space to switch on or switch off the traps on the map (consuming a Lever on the top right).

Miss a tempo will give you a Lever. But lose a Heart (on the top left) when your levers are overflow!

Pressing with Tempo / Collecting Coins to get Score (on the top mid).

Your aim is to survive and get a higher score.

------

Failure to Progress:

You need to Intentionally Miss some beats to Get Levers.

Mention, excessive missing will cost your Hearts (HP).

------

My first time of developing a rhythm game.  It's Really Challenging. I mean, to fit the beats.
